main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Denver, Colorado on 6 June 1954 and 8 June 1954, including observations of a bright light moving rapidly with no sound and an object resembling modern aircraft with large, glowing, tapered wings.
interesting points: The UFO was observed to be following the curvature of the Earth at a very high altitude, estimated to be around 52,223 feet.
One report described the object as resembling modern aircraft with swept back wings and a large tapered center, approximately twelve inches long, emitting a light green glow.
Observations included details such as the flight path of the object and its disappearance to the south, as well as its movement with no sound.
The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds, and the object was observed above the clouds with some clouds in the sky.
The report also mentioned the belief that the observed aircraft reported by Denver Air Traffic Control Center was a known aircraft, L-33, at an altitude of 26,000 feet.
sighted object: bright light and modern aircraft-like object with large glowing tapered wings
